inclusion.criterion: Previously diagnosed with multiple myeloma based on international myeloma working group (IMWG) criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum M-protein greater than or equal to (>=) 1 gram per deciliter (g/dL) (>=10 gram per liter);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Urine M-protein >=200 milligram (mg) per 24 hour and Serum Free Light chain (FLC) assay: Involved FLC Level >=10 mg/dL (>=100 mg/L) provided serum FLC ratio is normal;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Meet the pretreatment laboratory criteria as specified in the study protocol at and within 21 days before baseline (Day 1 of Cycle 1, before bortezomib administration for induction).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Has previously received treatment for multiple myeloma (including prior therapy with radiation or pulsed dexamethasone) as specified in the study protocol.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Has a history of any other malignancy within 5 years before enrolment as specified in the study protocol.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
